        public long getReconnectDelay()

      • setReconnectDelay

        public void setReconnectDelay​(long reconnectDelay)
        Sets the reconnect delay in seconds. Defaults to 1 second.
        Parameters:
        reconnectDelay -
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if reconnectDelay is smaller than 1.

      • getMaxBytesInMessage

        public int getMaxBytesInMessage()

      • setMaxBytesInMessage

        public void setMaxBytesInMessage​(int maxBytesInMessage)
        Sets the maximum number of bytes in the message for the MqttDecoder. Default value is 8092 as specified by Netty. The absolute maximum size is 256MB as set by the MQTT spec.
        Parameters:
        maxBytesInMessage -
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if maxBytesInMessage is smaller than 1 or greater than 256_000_000.
